ModulePrefs.title: BOR Calendar (en)
ModulePrefs.author: Neo-Tek
ModulePrefs.description: The Christian Orthodox calendar for the Orthodox Church of Romania (new style). Part of the aeons.ro project: http://code.google.com/p/aeons/ and http://aeons.ro
